item.title: “docker pull” certificate signed by unknown authority
item.description: For my case, the error was on “docker login” command. The solution I found for my ubuntu: I downloaded the crt file via firefox (lock icon in the url adress bar) and save it : ~/mydomain:1234.crt After that : cp ~/mydomain:1234.crt /usr/local/share/ca-certificates/ update-ca-certificates service docker restart Source: https://stackoverflow.com/a/62404469/3550759
